text: The rivers of Georgia include: == Major rivers == Major rivers of Georgia River Total length, km Length within Georgia, km Catchment area, thsd. km2 Alazani 407 390 12.0 Mtkvari 1515 351 21.1 Rioni 333 333 13.4 Enguri 206 206 4.1 Khrami 220 187 8.3 Tskhenistsqali 184 184 2.1 Iori 357 183 4.7 Qvirila 152 152 3.6 Supsa 117 117 1.1 Aragvi 110 110 2.7 Bzipi 110 110 1.5 Kodori 110 110 2.0 Acharistsqali 90 90 1.5 Chorokhi 438 26 22.1Ministry of Economic Development of Georgia.
